concept.title: Configure historical log files
concept.shortdesc: Configure the maximum number of historical log files maintained by a server.

ol.li: Navigate to ServersServer TypesWebSphere application servers
Select the relevant server from the list of servers
Select Logging and Tracing from the Troubleshooting section
Select JVM Logs from the General Properties list
Change the Maximum Number of Historical Log Files field to 30 for both the System.out and System.err files
Select OK to apply the changes
Save the changes to the master configuration.
